Languages.Title: Email Template
Languages.Content:
Email Template allows you to customize the formatting of emails sent by users. Marketing is emphasized as users may design and customise their own email themes. You can also  **create**, **edit**, and **delete** templates.

### How to set up your Email template?

1. Login to your **Churn360** account
2. Click on **Settings** → **Configurations** → **Templates**
3. Click on  **Create template** button  from the top right side of the page as shown below ( This opens a three-step configuration setup)
4. Select Email as the delivery mode 

![1_Screenshot_Email_templates_setup](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/1_Screenshot_Email_templates_setup.png){height="" width=""}

5. On the configuration page, Enter a **template name** and select a **template type** (NPS, CES, CSAT, or others) from the **Template type** dropdown 

![2_Screenshot_Email_template_setup](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/2_Screenshot_Email_template_setup.png){height="" width=""}

### How to design your email template?

                



You can create branded email templates from this design template editor. You can do this by a simple drag and drop function.

>For example, If you need to add a Header, image, or a button, click and drag the respective content block inside the editor space.

![2_New_ScreenGIF_Email_Template_content_block](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/2_New_ScreenGIF_Email_Template_content_block.gif){height="" width=""}


 If you have to upload a template, click and drag the HTML block inside the editor as shown below

![2_ScreenGif_HTML_for_default_template](https://cdn.document360.io/b618a27d-7a6e-4dfb-84d1-30d3ef656644/Images/Documentation/2_ScreenGif_HTML_for_default_template.gif){height="" width=""}


:::(Info) (Note:)
The configured email template can then be applied to campaigns.
:::
